articles.author: Belinda Jepsen
articles.title: Days after Alison Wilson's husband died, she learned she wasn't his only wife. - Mamamia
articles.description: The true story behind the BBC series, Mrs Wilson, streaming on Stan. From his four wives to his career with MI6 and his popular spy novels.
articles.content: At the funeral of Alexander Wilson in Portsmouth England, in 1963, two widows grieved by his graveside. Alison and Gladys. Each shared his last name, each had given him children and, until just a few days prior, each had believed herself to be his only curren… [+2100 chars]

articles.description: Wiping away tears, the popular presenter shared a personal story about his family.

During an emotional segment, the presenter opened up about his family.
